Description: The FHIR DocumentReference.Search (Correspondences) resource returns documentation related to a piece of correspondence, including who created the correspondence and when. It includes details about the patient associated with the correspondence, as well as a reference to the Binary resource that contains the documentation content associated with the correspondence.

author.Name: author
author.Description: FHIR ID for the providers who created the correspondence.

class.Name: class
class.Description: Must be set to “correspondence” if specified.
class.Optional: Optional starting in Epic version February 2022 or in Epic version November 2021 with special updates. Either “class” or “type” must be specified in earlier versions of Epic.

indexed.Name: indexed
indexed.Description: The instant or range of instants when a correspondence was sent.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: FHIR Patient ID. If provided, the search returns all matching results for this patient.

period.Name: period
period.Description: The instant when the encounter associated with the correspondence occurred.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: FHIR Patient ID. If provided, the search returns all matching results for this patient.

type.Name: type
type.Optional: Optional starting in Epic version February 2022 or in Epic version November 2021 with special updates. Either “class” or “type” must be specified in earlier versions of Epic.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

DocumentReference.Name: DocumentReference
DocumentReference.Description: An instance of the STU3 DocumentReference resource.

author.Name: author
author.Description: The person who authored the document. Reference to a Practitioner resource.

url.Name: url
url.Description: Link to the Binary FHIR resource.

period.Name: period
period.Description: The instant when the encounter associated with the correspondence occurred.

practiceSetting.Name: practiceSetting
practiceSetting.Description: The service associated with the author for the correspondence (for example, internal medicine).

description.Name: description
description.Description: A description of the reason for the correspondence.

indexed.Name: indexed
indexed.Description: The instant when the correspondence was sent.

masterIdentifier.Name: masterIdentifier
masterIdentifier.Description: A unique identifier for the document that is based on information such as the patient record. If the correspondence has an attached note record, this master identifier is the same as the identifier.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/IHE.MHD.Minimal.DocumentReference

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Patient to whom the document is related. Reference to a Patient resource.
